agreeToOptions: I confirm the goods, the price and the agree to the purchase.
agreeToTerms: I agree to the terms above.
terms: We promise to participate in the event in a manner that respects each other in accordance with the Code of Conduct. Participation may be restricted if it is determined that there is a serious violation of the Code of Conduct and threats to others, in which case the ticket purchased cannot be refunded.

common.refundWarning: Do you want to refund ticket?

common.shouldBuyConference: ChildCare/Youngcoder is for participants who have purchased a conference ticket. A list of programs is available to participants who have purchased conference tickets.ü§ì

overview.title: Ticket
overview.description: Pycon KR 2019 has various types of tickets including Conference, Tutorial, Youngcoder etc..

myTickets.alert: Canceled tickets are not valid. Therefore, it can not be used for entry.
myTickets.description: Check the detail of my purchased/canceled tickets.

conference.title: Conference Ticket
conference.description: It is the ticket that can enter the two-day conference of the main event of PyCon Korea on 17-18 (Sat-Sun) August.
conference.alert1: Conference ticket includes Presentation Session, Sponsor Booth, Lightning Talk, Open Space.
conference.alert2: Conference ticket It does not include tutorials, sprints, young coder, and child care.

patron.title: Patron
patron.minimumPriceWarning: Patron ticket price can be adjustable with at least {{price}} ‚Ç©

option.tshirtWarning: The T-shirt size is for reference only and may not be available depending on the situation.

tutorial.title: Tutorial Ticket
tutorial.description1: Tutorial is an educational program for those who are new or beginner to a subject. A tutor and our staffs are waiting for you. Tutorial is recommended for those who are new to python or to programming.
tutorial.description2: A further discussion will be needed in case of tutorials running by a company. We will inform you about details if you contact via program@pycon.kr

sprint.title: Sprint Ticket
sprint.description1: Sprint is an event to develop a interesting open-source project intensively. You can meet a new friend, also share an experience and knowledge for each other. Is this your first in sprint? That's fine! It will be the time that you can learn from a person who are experienced to have led a project regarding the topic.
sprint.description2: Sprints are targeted at open source projects with not only Python also all programming languages.

option.title: Childcare Ticket Option
option.name: Name
option.requireParkingDiscount: Do you need parking discount(50%) for all day?
option.keepInMindPlaceHolder: Please let us know everything we should know about your child such as your child has other siblings, allergies, etc.

payment.title: Ticket Payment
payment.description: Please fill in the form for proceeding a payment
